extendedInfo.description: Pages Manager helps admins connect with their audience and keep up with activity on multiple Pages, all in one place.â¢ Post updates and photos and respond to comments as your Pagesâ¢ View and reply to private messages sent to your Pagesâ¢ Option to get push notifications for new activity, tips and remindersâ¢ View your latest Page Insightsâ¢ Turn push notifications on or off for each Pageâ¢ Upload a photo to a specific albumâ¢ Attach a photo to a status updateâ¢ Change profile and cover photosâ¢ Save a shortcut to a Page on your phone's home screenâ¢ Share links from other apps to Pages Managerâ¢ Post and promote at the same timeâ¢ Turn an external link into a share postâ¢ Share photos from other appsâ¢ Create an albumâ¢ Save a draft of a postâ¢ Write posts on an Eventâ¢ Use bookmark links to see full-page Messages, Insights, Photos, Events and Activity Logâ¢ To delete a comment or ban someone from your Page, just tap the commentâ¢ Go to Settings to edit basic info and invite friends to like your PageNow you can get early access to the next version of Facebook Pages Manager by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://fb.me/pages_beta

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Lets me post updates and pics and see my notifications. Very easy to use. Much more convenient than sending my updates via sms. Love it!!
reviews.author: Valerie Derosia

reviews.title: Last Update Ruined App for me
reviews.comment: Before, I loved the app. I specifically loved the app because I had my pictures sorted by what I had uploaded to my page in the past and pictures I have yet posted to my page to keep content fresh. Now, the pictures are all mixed together when I go to select a picture I haven\'t used yet, and it makes it so much more difficult for me. So you have successfully ruined a great app for me. Thanks
reviews.author: Maxwell Stiffler

reviews.title: Awesome Work Guys
reviews.comment: Keep It Up Its A Great App I Can Make Admins The 4 stars Are Only for Admin Roles ! Great Job Zukerberg ! :D Be Awesome And Shine Like A Star !
reviews.author: PRUTHVI ZALA

reviews.title: Great-ish
reviews.comment: This app does about 85% of what I need but still can\'t do everything a page admin needs. Give me option to manage admin roles and edit comments, and I\'ll rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: Kate Huddleston

reviews.title: Schedule doesn\'t work on galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Tried to put three posts up for Fri sat and Sun and they all when to the page straight away even thought the facility to enter the time and date came up it still sent them to page straight away
reviews.author: peter cook

reviews.title: It\'s almost ok
reviews.comment: I like this app except for two things: 1) I can\'t manage the photos. Also whenever I click ona photo that\'s it, can\'t even zoom in. Sometimes the app crashes. 2) Can\'t reply to comments or see comment replies. It\'s all mixed up.
reviews.author: Finley Land

reviews.title: Pls fixed this problem
reviews.comment: I can\'t use this app... My cell phone is HTC one x+ and when I try to use this app there is   message tel me there is something agent wrong I can\'t use this app..
reviews.author: Ala M.k

reviews.title: Very excellent!
reviews.comment: HCL ME TABLET U2  It is very good!Nice and works for us!When I make pages I can delete messages and also I can see notification!Good Job \"Facebook co.\" Really great!You need to make more so many the makes many the installer
reviews.author: Jastine Decena

reviews.title: UPDATE REVIEW
reviews.comment: Why did u change the style for Posting Pics??!! I can\'t select from Gallery T.T I can only post new pics!!!! PLEASE CHANGE THE STYLE BUT CAN POST MULTIPLE PICS..  :(( Im so sad, the lagging is fixed but i dont like the new style..
reviews.author: Christine Flores

reviews.title: I agree with maxwell
reviews.comment: The photo upload system is a lot harder to use now.its difficult for me to find the right picture i want and because they are all jumbled up together it ruined my organization system as well.go back to the other system.
reviews.author: jesse rivas

reviews.title: OH NO!!
reviews.comment: Since yesterday\'s update I can\'t upload straight from the gallery. It keeps crashing!!! Before this update I had to always crop images before uploading as it would never ever let me upload from gallery  Nexus 4!!!!
reviews.author: Adam G

reviews.title: Please fix it!
reviews.comment: Please fix it to the old version, it\'s so hard to find a picture,, Let us choose photos from folder, don\'t open all photos in one file, it\'s so hard to find a photo!!!!
reviews.author: Samantha S

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed
reviews.comment: I used to love this app but the recent updates suck!!! Pics are all mixed up & can\'t easily find the pic I\'m looking for as I can\'t see them in gallery like before. & The captions don\'t work either!
reviews.author: Rima Sarmin

reviews.title: worse than Facebook app
reviews.comment: this app is wise than the Facebook app, I just don\'t get how a company that is internet reliant and huge can\'t make apps..... smh
reviews.author: Natasha Walker

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Kind of useless if I can\'t view pages I\'ve liked as a page. Super useless if I can\'t respond to comments.
reviews.author: Corinna Ashley

reviews.title: Good! But..
reviews.comment: I would give five stars if in the next update you could save pictures from the messages and we could reply to comments.
reviews.author: Andrea Paola

reviews.title: Good working app . And excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent , awesome . Can\'t explain this outstanding app.
reviews.author: Abu Salim

reviews.title: Still cant upload photos.
reviews.comment: I hope you\'ll do something about the photo uploading error. I have encountered this problem since last month.
reviews.author: katrina chelsea filomeno

reviews.title: Please give the Tag option like facebook Andoid app
reviews.comment: We are unable to tag like facebook app there is no additional button for add tags .
reviews.author: puneet arora

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: To the admins who have their pictures sorted, just open picture in your gallery you wish to post, press share symbol, and scroll through the list and select this manager. I\'d like to see a tag feature for tagging and sharing pages as well as people.
reviews.author: Deon Mclaren
